Authors: Hermanto S., Kaburuan E.R., Legowo N.
Title: Gamified SCRUM Design in Software Development Projects
Source title: 2018 International Conference on Orange Technologies, ICOT 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate, Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Hermanto, S., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate, Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kaburuan, E.R., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate, Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Legowo, N., Information Systems Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate, Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: From year to year, the software development method has been changing from traditional method to Agile approach which has quite complicated and tricky way. SCRUM is one of example agile contain iteration called sprint which describes phasing running on the timeline of the project and by sprint planning the SCRUM master (as a leader) can direct the team to finish on a date. The motivation for SCRUM team member will influence the result, so in this research, we try to design a gamified method into SCRUM. We make a prototype design about gamification in SCRUM development and also spread a questionnaire to the respondent already have experience with SCRUM development. The result shows that people motivation will increase when they feel appreciated, rewarded and the atmosphere of the competition was made well supporting the team's performance. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: agile; gamification; motivation; prototype; SCRUM; software development
Index Keywords: Citrus fruits; Design; Iterative methods; Motivation; Software design; Software engineering; agile; Agile approaches; Gamification; prototype; Prototype designs; SCRUM; Software development methods; Software development projects; Software prototyping
